thread.section_title: ToursByLocals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ToursByLocals | www.toursbylocals.com
thread.title: Liane Flynn

author: Liane Flynn
title: Liane Flynn
text:
Chansay developed an itinerary for us based on our interests. His program delivered all that was promised and more. We had a truly wonderful 5 day road trip with memorable highlights every day.
Chansay's ability to educate us about Lao culture and values occurred through dialogue and his generous sharing of his own life experiences and values.
Chansay is an outstanding ambassador for Lao and for tours by Locals.
